scripts.scss:dev: sass --embed-source-map --style=compressed src/scss/critical.scss tmp/scss/critical.css && sass --style=compressed src/scss/non-critical.scss dist/assets/css/non-critical.css
scripts.scss: sass --style=compressed --no-source-map src/scss/critical.scss src/site/_includes/critical.css && sass --style=compressed --no-source-map src/scss/non-critical.scss dist/assets/css/non-critical.css
scripts.autoprefixer:dev: postcss tmp/scss/critical.css --output src/site/_includes/critical.css --use autoprefixer && postcss dist/assets/css/non-critical.css --use autoprefixer --map --replace
scripts.styles:dev: npm run scss:dev && npm run autoprefixer:dev
scripts.styles: npm run scss && npm run autoprefixer
scripts.styles:legacy: sass --no-source-map src/scss/etc/ie8.scss dist/assets/css/ie8.css && sass --no-source-map src/scss/etc/ie9.scss dist/assets/css/ie9.css
scripts.js: cat src/js/* > src/site/_includes/scripts.js && uglifyjs src/site/_includes/scripts.js -m -o src/site/_includes/scripts.js
scripts.build:assets: npm run styles && npm run autoprefixer && npm run img && npm run fonts && npm run js && npm run styles:print && npm run styles:legacy && npm run shiv
scripts.build:devassets: npm run styles:dev && npm run autoprefixer:dev && npm run img && npm run fonts && npm run js && npm run styles:print && npm run styles:legacy && npm run shiv
scripts.build:dev: npm run clear && npm run build:devassets && npm run build:site
scripts.build: npm run clear && npm run build:assets && npm run build:site
scripts.watch:css: onchange 'src/scss' --exclude 'src/scss/etc/ie8.scss' --exclude 'src/scss/etc/ie9.scss' -- npm run styles:dev && npm run autoprefixer:dev
scripts.watch: run-p watch:css watch:img watch:fonts watch:js watch:legacycss
scripts.start: npm run clear && npm run build:devassets && run-p serve watch
scripts.staging:
npm run build && echo 'User-agent: *
Disallow: /' > dist/robots.txt
scripts.bump:major: bump major --commit 'Bumps version number to %s' src/site/_data/site.js *.json
scripts.bump:minor: bump minor --commit 'Bumps version number to %s' src/site/_data/site.js *.json
scripts.bump:patch: bump patch --commit 'Bumps version number to %s' src/site/_data/site.js *.json
